title: Identify the Dependencies
description: Given a tightly-coupled class, identify all dependencies that should be injected.
hints: Look for any objects created with getInstance(), create(), or getLogger()
Each of these should become a constructor parameter
Consider using interfaces to define contracts

testCases.description: Identify 4 dependencies: database/dao, network client, cache, and logger
testCases.expectedBehavior: All hard-coded dependencies replaced with constructor parameters
